revised_title: Investigating the Deflection of the Plumb-Line in India and the Attraction of the Himalaya Mountains
tldr: The author examines the deflection of the plumb-line in India due to the attraction of the Himalaya Mountains and elevated regions beyond, considering the effects of a deficiency of matter below the mountain mass. The study explores the impact of this phenomenon on the ellipticity of the Earth and the importance of understanding the density variations within the Earth's interior for accurate geodetic measurements.
